content: decrease rounds until you have 16 stitches left graft stitches and weave in ends if you have issues with gauge you might consider washing and blocking your socks before stitching the lines use your tapestry needle to stitch lines between the girl s hand and balloons 12 13 14 16 and 17 this represents the lines the girl is holding refer to the picture above you can work interrupted lines in order to avoid too long floats see example socks on page 1 if you have not done so before wash and block your socks now 10 th e chain ar t 11
